title: Your Shop: date of re-opening?
body: basically the title. and is it possible to get the same skins?

replies.body: Sounds like you're a little new to the special Your Shop. That's not a feature that is always active, as you already know from its closing recently. It only comes pops up a couple times a year, and we don't have specific dates for the next opening yet. Be sure to watch the [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) for that info!
thank you for your reply, its sad but understandable, really wanted that Kalista skin lol.
